content: welcome crocheters today it s my turn to share a brand new free pattern with you as part of the autumn accessories make along my cody hat pattern is designed using king cole merino blend dk yarn 3 and a 5 mm h hook i ve made this pattern available in sizes baby to adult for free in my post about the make along this make along includes projects for both knitters and crocheters each week from august 18 to september 8 2021 a new free pattern will be released this make along features projects designed by members of the north america king cole brand ambassador team to find out what supplies you will need and to access the free patterns please visit the announcement post here 1 **supplies ** yarn dk weight yarn king cole merino blend dk 1 76 oz 50 g / 115 yds 104 m 100% pure new wool colors 2 skeins in carnation shade 3090 or 2 skeins in irish navy shade 52 hook 5 mm h finished project * prototype samples * child 6-10 years hat irish navy 2 04 oz 58 g and 133 yds 121 m small child hat carnation 1 83 oz 52 g and 119 yds 108 m notions scissors yarn needle stitch marker **difficulty level ** easy **finished size ** this hat is designed between mid-ear and the base of the earlobe for sizes preemie to 12-24 months you will need 1 skein of your chosen color of yarn for sizes small child 3-5 years to adult large you will need 2 skeins of your chosen color of yarn 1 https //www kingcole com/king-cole-north-american-cal-2021/
